biotools.summary: Develope interactive data exploration applications in genomics and systems biology. Collection of packages in the Go programming language that help application developers i) interface with the R statistical programming language; ii) specify and run statistical analysis pipelines; and iii) interface with online databases such as MsigDB and KEGG.
